description: There's nothing quite like an energizing cocktail to leave you feeling relaxed and satisfied. But if you're watching your waistline, most cocktails are off-limits due to their high calorie and carb counts.The Golden Roots healthy cocktail is a low-calorie perfect guilt-free indulgence—made with&nbsp;vodka, pineapple juice, and lemonade. This fresh beverage will hit the spot whether you're enjoying it poolside or on a night in.So next time you're in the mood for a cocktail, ditch the heavy options in favor of this healthy and delicious alternative!
name: Golden Roots
recipeIngredient: 3/4 oz. Golden syrup or Agave nectar
